# lexicallyNormalize()

**Instance Method**

Collapse `.` and `..` components lexically (i.e. without following symlinks).

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func lexicallyNormalize()
```

## Discussion

Examples:

- `/usr/./local/bin/.. => /usr/local`
- `/../usr/local/bin   => /usr/local/bin`
- `../usr/local/../bin => ../usr/bin`
title: lexicallyNormalize()
